meanings.sent1: After a long day of work, his energy palls, and he just wants to rest.
meanings.sent2: The excitement of the party palls after a while, and people start leaving.
meanings.sent3: The magician's spell palls, and the audience sees how the trick was done.
meanings.sent4: The charm of the old town never palls, no matter how many times you visit.
meanings.sent5: As the sun sets, the beauty of the landscape never palls, always breathtaking.

meanings.definition: A cloth spread over a coffin, hearse, or tomb
meanings.sent1: The funeral director carefully placed the palls over the coffin.
meanings.sent2: The somber palls draped over the casket added to the solemn atmosphere.
meanings.sent3: The elegant palls covered the coffin, giving it a dignified look.
meanings.sent4: The black palls symbolized the mourning of the family and friends.
meanings.sent5: The soft fabric of the palls provided comfort to those grieving.

meanings.definition: A dark cloud or covering of smoke or dust
meanings.sent1: The palls of smoke from the factory obscured the sky.
meanings.sent2: The palls of dust settled on the furniture, creating a layer of grime.
meanings.sent3: The palls of fog enveloped the city, creating an eerie atmosphere.
meanings.sent4: The palls of darkness seemed to swallow the entire room.
meanings.sent5: The palls of mist hung low over the lake, shrouding it in mystery.
